text: The 1997 Northeast Conference Baseball Tournament was held in May 1997 at Skylands Park in Sussex, New Jersey. The league's top four teams competed in the double elimination tournament. Top-seeded won their first and only tournament championship then won the NCAA play-in series against Siena to advance to the 1997 NCAA Division I Baseball Tournament. ==Seeding and format== The top four finishers were seeded one through four based on conference regular-season winning percentage. They played a double-elimination tournament. {| class="wikitable" ! Team !! W !! L !! Pct !! GB !!
